channel.title: Error with my UID
channel.description:
Okay I did the tutorial for making it so only players with your client can connect to your server but for some reason when I compile my server it says its not recognising this command.
LoggedOut = false; ^
I'm using devo 7 source and I dont know the original code.

item.title: Error with my UID
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

This belongs in the server help section.

However, I think you mean it can’t find the variable. So add something like this: boolean LoggedOut = false

Read full topic

item.title: Error with my UID

item.description:

Okay I did the tutorial for making it so only players with your client can connect to your server but for some reason when I compile my server it says its not recognising this command.
